utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT

segments.text: Zodiac

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And I just think serial killers, in general, are interesting, so the movie was really good. And it was just neat to see that world. Like it went really in-depth. It was like almost 3 hours long, so you got to really feel like you were a part of that world and time period. And see what the detectives and the police did and the investigators.
